active_learning.discussion_prompt: In the context of Supply Chain Risk Management (SCRM), debate the pros and cons of automating key security metrics (e.g., vendor compliance rates, third-party risk scores) versus manual collection. Reference NIST SP 800-55 guidelines and discuss potential impacts on decision-making, data accuracy, and resource allocation.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
